column4: please can someone help me installing STEAM in ubuntu using wine? http://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=1554 what does it mean when they say "point wine to it"  ?
please does anyone know how to install steam in ubuntu?
using WINE
should work out of the box, don't think crossover hacked it theirselves
NTAuth... http://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=1554
that the games you have on your account work could be an completely other problem
in the how-to, there are specific instructions
ah, yeah, the IE ActiveX Gecko link, forgot that :) you DO need that
what does it mean when it says "point wine to it..."
does that mean run it using wine?
that reg stuff is not needed, only if the cab download fails
NTAuth... how do i install gecko?
wine iexplore http://google.com -- iexplore is NOT really IE :P
NTA: and that installs gecko automatically?
after clicking on a button, yes :P
nta: which button??
not on an ubuntu system right now, there should be an button after running the command
NTA which command?
wine iexplore http://google.com ;-)
NTA there's no button when i do that
there should be, or gecko is already installed, then continue installing steam :-)
